other_tests.findings: Identified two distinct missense mutations E174K (c.571G >A) of maternal origin and a de novo mutation M45I (c.186G >C).
Confirmed that the mutation M45I occurred de novo in the paternal germline or in early development.
Mutation M45I resulted in the absence of in vitro alkaline phosphatase activity, indicating severe allele.
Confirmed paternity with a risk of error of 10^-12.
